name: trigger-jenkins-job
description: Triggers specified job at the Jenkins instance
author: IKtech Limited

inputs.name: jenkinsJobUrl
inputs.label: Jenkins job URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: URL of the Jenkins job to trigger

inputs.name: jenkinsUsername
inputs.label: Jenkins user name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the user who can run the job in question

inputs.name: jenkinsApiToken
inputs.label: Jenkins API Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: User API Token for the above user

inputs.name: authenticationToken
inputs.label: Authentication Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: An authentication token granting extension access to the Jenkins job in question

inputs.name: waitForResponse
inputs.label: Wait For Jenkins Response
inputs.helpMarkDown: This flag instruct plugin to wait for Jenkins to complete the Job. Default behaviour is to wait for completion

inputs.name: waitTimeout
inputs.label: Wait Timeout
inputs.helpMarkDown: Timeout in minutes specifying for how long plugin should wait for Jenkins to complete the Job. Default value is -1: no timeout

inputs.name: parameters
inputs.label: Parameters
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional job parameters in the form of <name>=<value>&<name>=<value>
